item.title: General Resources
item.description:
🚀 Welcome to a resources page for Data Science research. Here you will find a list of links for data, tools, tutorials and related resources that may be very helpful to your work. Note: If you find any resources that you think are important, please let me know [obonhamcarter(a)allegheny(dot)com]. 😄

​

  • Textbooks

    • Wickham, Hadley, and Garrett Grolemund. R for Data Science: Import, Tidy, Transform, Visualize, and Model Data., O’Reilly Media, Inc., 2016.
